name: The Outstanding Contraption
description:
Made for the Oculus Quest.

Created in 36 hours for the Game Dev Club at SJSU's Extra Life chairty Game Jam.

Created with the Godot Engine (Build 3.2 alpha ver 1), The Oustanding Contraption is my take on what would happen if "The Incredible Machine" made the leap to VR. Thought not nearly as intricate, I feel like given more time to develop this could be a worthy successor but given the time frame I'm still really proud of the outcome.
